item.description:
The City of Lowell MA is celebrating Independence Day Monday July 5th at the Vandenberg Esplanade and Sampas Pavillion along the Merrimack River.
The fun starts at 4pm, and there will be food, music, and fun activities.
as well as the weekly Classic Car Show at the Heritage farm Ice Cream & Restaurant at 6PM

Meet at 6PM, and see the old cars from days gone by, in the parking lot of the Heritage Farm Ice Cream & Restaurant
then we'll stroll across the street to the Sampas Pavilion along the Merrimack River
to enjoy the FREE Concert by "JOE'S ATTIC", while the sun sets
and then At 9PM, enjoy the fireworks display over the Merrimack River

Bring your lawn chairs or blankets, to sit and relax and enjoy the concert and fireworks.
item.how_to_find_us: 6pm on front porch of Heritage Farm, or by cell (will provide # to all YES replies)

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: FREE Classic Car Show, Concert, Fireworks in Lowell MA
